snippet: The Visual Effects Society gives a boost to "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" and "Hugo," while Justin Bieber's film winds up on the short list of inspirational films up for the Epiphany Prize
abstract: The Visual Effects Society gives a boost to "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" and "Hugo," while Justin Bieber's film winds up on the short list of inspirational films up for the Epiphany Prize
lead_paragraph: It's not every day that Justin Bieber and Terrence Malick are up for the same award.

headline.main: Justin Bieber Makes an Awards-Season Appearance, Sort of
